ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: Ive got that battle drum, and i say it is a MUST for you.  I run almost TWICE as fast as i do with a normal drum, which is pretty incredible. So whenever you
ygData.messageBody:
Ive got that battle drum, and i say it is a MUST for you. I run almost
TWICE as fast as i do with a normal drum, which is pretty incredible.
So whenever you get the chance, pick one up!

-- Eronan Songweaver [Cazic-Thule]









Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> well another bard i know had one she wanted to trade me for. what did she
> want? my rubicite arms. LOL. needless to say i don't have the drum yet.
> however i would pay 270pp for one, might as well have it.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:28 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lute of the Gypsy Princess
> >
> >
> > From: John Kim <kim@...>
> >
> > On Wed, 30 Jun 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> > >
> > > I have the lute, and did not notice any difference when i
> > first gotten it,
> > > though i have not tested recently. You never know it could
> > have an effect
> > > in the future, so its good to have. I heard the battle
> > drum you get from
> > > Mistmoore has an increased percussion effect too, but I do
> > not have it yet.
> >
> > A friend of mine got the drum last night but sold it before I
> > had a chance to test it. 270pp (yes, two hundred and seventy
> > platinum). It was enough for him to drop what he was doing,
> > and hop the boat over to deliver the drum to the purchaser.
> > Maybe it *does* have an increased effect.
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
> > kim@...
> >
